page.title: 18A Typical Day at School
page.content: the afternoon play.Usually the boys are playing football so we keep out of their way.At half past two we go back to the classroom and carry on with what we were doing.At three'o'clock, or later,we pack away and sometimes have part of a story. Then at quarter past three we all go home. To help us with our lessons we use the television, tape recordings of radio broadcasts and the computer. In thw sschool grounds there is a Nature Reserve in which we observe and record all kinds of pond life, insects birds and plants. We enjoy music including singing, playing the recorder and many types of percussion instruments. Debbie Jones.
